speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Your son’s a big fan of our website.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: He’s a big fan of you.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Even before this started, I was trying to get a retweet out of him for about six months.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: We’ll do that.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Well, you got me one on one, but he’d DM me, I’d be like, “Okay, get the old man to get a retweet. Get the numbers up, then we’ll talk business.”
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Well, you’re doing pretty well on that [crosstalk 00:00:53] .
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Yeah. Well, so are you.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Yeah, we are. We have good numbers.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I consider myself, believe it or not, apolitical. I don’t consider myself wildly Republican, Democrat, caught down in the middle. In fact, this is my first interview I’ve ever done, so I started at the top.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: You started very well, that’s good.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I was going to give you the heads up, I don’t know if you can remember this. You once were on Ali G’s show, and you were the only one that sniffed out that was a fake interview and the whole thing. I don’t know if you remember that. I thought maybe you’d be like, “Oh, this guy is a fake.”
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Were you involved with that show in some way?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: No, not at all. I just watched it on TV.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: But you’re right, I was the only one-
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: 30 seconds, in and out.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: All these guys, I said, “Hey, this guy is a total fraud,” and I left, and then I found out.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: And everyone else sits there for six hours, I know.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: You’re the only one that’s ever given me credit for that.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: That was a very sharp move because he’s pretty good at that. He gets everybody.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Now I like this interview. No matter what he does it, I like this interview now, Mariano. That’s right. I said, “What’s going on with this guy?” I just felt it was a phony deal.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Yeah. And nobody else did it. Nobody else smelled it out.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: He said he was from British Broadcasting Corporation. They called up with everything, beautiful, the voices, “This is British Broadcast …” And then this guy shows up, I said, “This is a …” like immediately. And thank you very much, you gave me credit.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: On it, good.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Because I never get credit for anything good.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I’m pretty good, that’s what I’m saying.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: You’re pretty good. I like you.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: And here’s part of it, I hate politics, my dad loves politics. The thing that drives me nuts is I feel like for us, which is good, they’re like, “Hey Dave, you’re a snowflake.” “Hey Dave, you’re a conservative, white, crazy person.” And almost on each side, you can predict what somebody is going to say, which drives me nuts. It’s like you put it in a box. So one of the things that I’ve been thinking about, and for all the people like me, which I think a good amount of the country is still like, “Which way am I going to vote?” One of the things that I have a question for, and again, I think it matters. I’m very curious on the answer.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: When the Kaepernick thing started, I was critical of it. And as it’s continued, baseball players now, I heard you say, if they kneel, you’ll turn the game off. And we’ve got the Black Lives Matter protests, so for me, how does somebody who’s dissatisfied, in your world, what’s the way for them to show it? Because we don’t want them looting and doing all the stuff they’re doing. To me, that’s a silent protest that is far better than going out on the streets and create crime. So I’m curious, what would you do if you had an issue with the country or something to show your displeasure?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Well, I mean, you can always say you run for office, right? You become successful. You could run for a lower office, you can do things, but there are ways. You get groups together and there can be very friendly ways of doing it, very successful. I mean, you’re going to have negative rebounds if it keeps up the way it is. As an example of Portland, this is crazy. 51 days, we sent in very powerful, not military but very strong people. The police are good but they were told not to do anything by the radical left mayor. Now you have to go out and speak your mind. I think speaking your mind is good, but you have to do it fairly. We are for justice, but we’re for law and order. It’s got to be law and order, and there is law and order.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I put something out when they were starting to rip down statues. I went out, I found an old law, an old bill, you couldn’t get it passed today. You get 10 years in jail. 10 years and no games, and we have a lot of people in jail right now. If you ripped down a federal statue, because the states have to take care of their own, unfortunately, because I’d do that too, but you rip down a federal statue you get 10 years in jail. 10 years, no three months, and nothing’s happened since then. It was amazing. I signed it. I had a news conference. I said, “If you do it …” And we were supposed to have thousands of people march on Washington that day, nobody showed up.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: How do we close the divide? At my age it just seems half the country hates the other half, and no matter what you say, they can’t get along. And you’re the lightning rod, there is no doubt about that in my mind. Do you agree with that? That you’re like a lightning rod.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Sometimes for a purpose. I mean, but-
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: How do we bring it together so the two sides right now that are at heads can be like, “You are my guy.”
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I think it was happening, and then we got hit by the China Virus. I think it was happening, success. Our country never did better. The best employment numbers in the history of our country. Best unemployment numbers, African American, Asian, American, Hispanic American, everybody, best unemployment numbers in history, Best stock market we’ve ever had. Although I must tell you, as you know probably very well, the stock market is almost at the same level right now, which a great tribute.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I wasn’t watching it today. That’s why I went down today. I’ve been killing the stock market.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: But the stock market has been absolutely great.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Yep, great since March.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: A lot of things are happening. Great housing numbers the other day, great everything. We’re doing really well. We’re trying to get rid of the rest of this pandemic, but success does it, and we were ready to do it. Because if you look at, when you say Hispanic, or when you say African American, Asian American, they were all working. Everybody was making a lot of money. Everybody was doing good, and it was coming together, and then China sent us this horrible, bad present, a real bad present. They could have stopped it. They should’ve stopped it. We made a trade deal with China, and it was a great deal, but it means much less to me now than it did then, because I’m not happy with what they’ve done to the world. They stopped it going into China from Wuhan, but they didn’t stop it going into Europe, the United States and the rest of the world.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: But we were ready to do it, and the word is success, and I think we’re going to have that. I think we’re going to have a great next year. You’ll be able to see the results before the election, which is interesting because the election is November 3rd, at the beginning of November, the numbers are going to come out for the third quarter. I predict those numbers are going to be really great, despite the fact that Democrats want to keep their areas closed because they want the numbers to be bad.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Right, they politicized it.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I mean, can you imagine?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Yes.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I know how you feel about that. I think a big part of the reason they do it is for politics.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I don’t know whether a Black Lives Matter person would be like, “Well, the economy, great, but we still want the president to come out, whether it be Twitter or whatever, and have our back.” So that’s where the kneeling and things like that seems like such a small concession, and the thing to be like, “Yep, Donald’s our guy.”
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I don’t like the kneeling. I must be honest with you, I don’t like the kneeling. I didn’t like it for the NFL. I think there are many ways of showing you’re unhappy, because when the NFL was happening-
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I hate Goodell, by the way.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I know, exactly. I know that. I’ve heard that actually. I don’t know why he did it. In the middle of the summer, all of a sudden, sitting in a T-shirt in his basement, he came out with this thing that nobody was even thinking about it.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: He spiked at it. That’s vintage Goodell. Nobody was talking about it, and he brought it back to the forefront.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I don’t understand. He’s talking in the middle of the summer, he comes out and he’s sitting there and he looked nice, but I wouldn’t say like Mariano. He looked nice in his T-shirt. I don’t know if I’d look much worse than that to be honest with you. I wouldn’t wear a T-shirt. I think he would’ve looked better in a suit and tie.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: That’s why your Twitter game is strong.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: No, he would have looked better in a suit and tie. If I had any advice, number one, he could have waited until at least the fall. But more importantly, I would have worn a suit or a tie or even an open shirt that’s loose, not tight.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I got you.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Okay. So he came out with this thing, Dave, and everyone was saying, “Where did this come from now?” And the whole big thing started, and he’s made a mistake.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I actually have a question on your presidential power. So you may not know this, but during the NFL draft, he said, “I’m going to do a charity auction, and somebody can sit in my basement, watch Monday Night Football with me, and the charity will go to COVID.” Well, I bid. And one, I spent $250,000 to win that chart. I won it fair and square, he rejected it.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Well, he wanted no part of you, obviously.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I know. I don’t know if you can arrest the guy for that.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: No, but I think it was a wise move.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Yeah, by him.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: It was a very smart move he did.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: That’s the first nice thing you said about him.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Look, he’s working hard and everything, but it’s a strange thing.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: He’s the most overpaid guy in the history of human beings.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Well, he makes a lot of money.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: A lot of money for a job that a lot of people could do. All right, I have to ask this question because we followed. When you meet world leaders, you stick the handshake on them, and it looks like you’re going for the power move. Is that intentional?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Before COVID, right now I guess-
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Right, now you can’t. This is pre-COVID.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: He’s the one, the only one I’ve shaken hands with in a long time. You, because you stuck your hand out, and I’m saying, “What are we doing?” But I shook your hand. You were tested?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I was tested when I came in here.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Otherwise they’d take you out right now. They’ll end the interview. Did you notice that? He stuck his hand out and I said, “What do I do here?” Rather than insult him, I said fine.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I appreciated that. I don’t even think-
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Hey, I immediately ran, washed my hands, no. In the days, like four months ago, I just … People don’t know that I get along really great with the world leaders. I’m tougher with the world leaders than any president’s been. I’ve been tougher on Russia by far with the pipeline, with our military, with the oil. Now the number one energy producer in the world, and there’s nobody even close. I’ve been very tough with Russia. I mean, China, nobody’s been tough like me with China. And that’s not to be tough, that’s because for years they’ve taken advantage. So many countries, not those two only, the whole world, our allies, NATO, the whole world has taken advantage of our country.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: But despite that, I have a very good relationship with leaders. I mean-
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Because of the handshake?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I shake their hand. I hug them.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: You power shake them.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I have a lot of great … Abe of Japan, look, they’ve been ripping us off for years and years. They send the cars in, there’s no tax. We send a car to them, they say, “We don’t take your cars.” This is the kind of thing that we’ve put up with. We defend these countries, we get nothing for it. I’ve ended a lot of the craziness that’s gone on.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Do you love doing Twitter?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: There are times when I love it, too much sometimes, right?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Yeah.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Where’s Dan? I think we have-
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Speaker 5
transcription: He’s right there.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Dan, what’s our number now, total?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dan
transcription: 207 million.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Can you believe it?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: What happens to those Twitter accounts? Is it yours when it’s over? Do you lose all this?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: It’s mine. I don’t know if I’ll ever use it again, but it certainly was good. It’s a platform … Look, we have fake news. You don’t know about that, but we have fake news out there.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I very much know about that. That exists in my world as well.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: And then, Dave, we have a very big voice. When you have the kind of numbers that we have, you’re able to get the word out and an honest word, and it’s important. So it’s been very important for me.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Because I follow you on Twitter, and I know I do this, but I’m not the pre … well, my nickname is El pres, but I’m a company, so we’re doing it. Do you ever tweet out and wake up like, “Oh man, I wish I didn’t send that one out.”
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Too often.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: In the old days, before this, you’d write a letter and you’d say, “This letter is really bad,” you put it on your desk and then you go back tomorrow and you say, “Oh, I’m glad I didn’t send it,” right? But we don’t do that with Twitter. We put it out instantaneously. We feel great, and then you start getting phone calls, “Did you really say this?” I say, “What’s wrong with that?” And you find a lot of things. You know what I find? It’s not the tweets, it’s the retweets that get you in trouble.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: You’ve been caught retweeting, and people be like, “Oh, he just retweeted this crazy person,” so you don’t even look, you just press retweet. You just fire from the hip.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: You see something that looks good and you don’t investigate it, and you don’t look at what’s on the helmet exactly, which is in miniature and you don’t blow it up, and sometimes it’s … I have found almost always, it’s the retweets that get you in trouble.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I’ve seen that a little bit with you. We got opening day today.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Good.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Fauci is throwing out the first pitch, can you give him any tips? You think he’s going to be able to. I mean, he seems like a little guy. I’ve never seen him. Are you expecting a good pitch here.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Well, they say he was a good basketball player, and he is a very nice guy.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: How tall is he?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Well, he was not tall, but he was a fast little guard, and they say he was a good basketball player. He’s actually a very nice guy. We don’t always agree on everything. He’d like to do things that I don’t like to do, but ultimately I make the decision, but we make it all a group of people. And he’s been here for like 45 years, for many, many years, and he’s a nice man actually.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I’m a sports guy. The company that bought us Penn National are a gambling company, so sports gambling is a big part of what we do. I switched to the stock market actually, day trading. Fauci is on my X list, because every time he talks and says the country should stay inside, my stocks tank, so I don’t like that aspect of it.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Well, he’d like to see it closed up for a couple of years, but that’s okay because I’m president, so I say, “Well, I appreciate your opinion, now give me another opinion, somebody please.”
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Yeah, you overruled.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Well, you have to. Now we’re open and we’re doing well, and I just had a press conference about opening the schools. You’ve got to open the schools. They have a stronger immune system even than you have, or I have, the kids.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: That’s not saying much for me.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: That’s not saying much?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: No.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: But they do. They have it. It’s amazing. You look at the percentage, it’s a tiny percentage of 1%. And in that one case, I mean, I looked at a couple of cases, if you have diabetes, if you have problems with something, but the kids are in great shape. So we want to open the schools and we’re opening the country. We had great numbers announced the other day. And two weeks ago, we had the biggest number of jobs we’ve ever had. And the month before that, we had the same thing. A lot of good things are happening, and I think it looks like a V. We have a lot of people that would like to see their states closed. I have a feeling on November 4th, they’ll open them up. I think they want to do it for political reasons, but we’re doing well.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: The polls are starting to really shape up. Dave, we were doing great. We were sailing. George Washington would have had a hard time beating us. And then when the China virus came in, all of a sudden, it’s a dampener, it really is.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Well, COVID is bad.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Well, it’s a downer, though, psychologically. It went down, and now we’re really starting to do well. We’re looking really good at a lot of different places.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: I’m sure you’ve been asked this. It’s one of the questions that I had when I was thinking of what I would ask you here, because you theoretically, for somebody like me, who’s sports, entertainment, having fun, you had the dream life, seemingly. And there’s a part of me that’s like, “I wonder if he ever,” and I know the answer is going to be no, “Regrets it.” Because now, I mean, you’re the most famous person in the world. My guess is nobody ever said, “Hey, I don’t like Donald Trump before he became president,” but now everyone has an opinion and your life has changed forever when seemingly you had the dream life beforehand.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I was in so many rap songs, like 79 or something. I was in every rap. This is before I did this, right? It’s a very interesting thing that you say, because the best day in my life in terms of business and life and everything was the day before I announced I’m running for president. Everything was good. The company was good. I had finished up a lot of jobs that were very successful, and then I said, “I want to do this.” Now, I’m really glad I did, but I was treated very unfairly with fake Russia. Russia, Russia, Russia. Ukraine, Ukraine, all fake stuff. It’s a very vicious business.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Somebody said, “Who’s the toughest in the world to deal with? Is it Russia? Is it China? Could it be North Korea?” I said, “No, the toughest is the United States. It’s the toughest to deal with.” When you look at what I have to do, I have to focus on the big picture, but I also have to focus … I have so many people on the left or call them Democrats, call them whatever you want, and then you look at what they’re doing with cities. Every city is run by a liberal Democrat and they’re going to hell, and we have to do something. We just sent people into Chicago. We sent people into Portland, as we said. We’re sending people into New York to help out. It’s incredible, but I love doing it. There was this phony deal that I was devastated when I won, because I couldn’t have my life. I had a great life, I did.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: One thing that happened, I was going into a thing called the Robin Hood Foundation. I’ll never forget it. It was just about the night I announced or whatever. And my wife looked at me, she said, “I hear people booing.” And she was with me for a long time. We’ve been together a long time. She said, “Some people are booing.” I said, “Yeah, but some people were also clapping wildly.” She said, “You know what, I’ve been with you a long time, I’ve never heard anyone boo you.” This was right after I started being the politician. It meant something because I said it’s the first time in my life I was ever booed. You know this.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Yeah.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I’d go to Yankee stadium, people would go … Who is a 100%? But it was pretty close. And now, I would say this, I have more fervor on the one side, and I have far more animosity on the other side.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: That’s the vibe I get, “This is my DNA, but I’m now president.” I feel like so many interviews, they’re always coming from an agenda, positive or negative, and what noticed, I think, they come at you hard, you just come back harder. And that’s a very different thing for the president. I mean, I’m the president of Barstool, but people would say, is it presidential? Is it not? And you just do your thing and it wins. I wondered that. Here’s a hypothetical, if the perfect candidate, let’s not say Republican, Democrat, came along and said, “If we make him president, this country is going to be prosperous, everyone will get along.” Would you step aside?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I mean, I don’t know that such a person exists.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Probably not.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: And I should say yes, absolutely, I would. So let me say it that way, because that’s a much more politically correct? Absolutely.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: You’re not known to be politically correct.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: But it doesn’t work that way, because it just doesn’t, unfortunately. I really believe success. We were there. Everybody was working. Nobody’s … Probably you, I don’t know how you’re doing now, but you were probably doing better four months ago.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Well, I got into the stock market right when it went up.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Okay. Well, you got in at the right time, but a lot of people with the 401(k), I mean, they’re doing phenomenally. But a lot of people sold stock, and now they’re saying, “I missed it.” I said to people, “Don’t sell. Just don’t sell. Because the foundation is so strong, don’t sell.” But the people that really lost in terms of economic are the people that got out. The people that stayed in, they stayed with me, they’re doing great, and we’re almost at record highs.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Okay. The last thing, and I’m going to wrap this up. And this, we asked for permission, you can say no if you don’t want to do it. My dad and I have had debates forever. He’s not the biggest fan of yours, what I want to do is kind of a prank. He doesn’t know I’m even here, but we’ve talked a lot. I want to call him, FaceTime him, and just he’d die if he saw that I was with you.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Go ahead. You can do it quickly, right?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Yeah. It’ll take two seconds. He knows it’s coming. This is going to be a-
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Oh, he does, that’s bad. That’s too bad.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Well, this is going to be absolutely great. Let me get the thing here. I have it all set. This will take two seconds. Dad, this is going to be-
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Is he a good dad?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: He’s a great dad.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Good.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: All right. I’ll put you on with-
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Don’t worry about socially distancing.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: No, I’ll come further. Hey, I got a question for you, what would you ask this guy, dad?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Speaker 7
transcription: I know. Trista sent me something, so I’m not shocked.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: The goal was to shock you. We’ve had a very good interview.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: And you have a very talented son, good guy.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Speaker 7
transcription: Really?
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: That’s all he’s got.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: He’s honest. You have an honest father.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Speaker 7
transcription: I was wondering why you were pinning me down. Mr. President, he never calls me.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: That’s no good.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: There it is.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Speaker 7
transcription: I haven’t heard from him, unsolicited, in a long time.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Well, there you go. You just needed a meeting with the president.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Speaker 7
transcription: I knew something was going on, sir. I knew something was going on, and I’m not shocked, although I didn’t expect to see your face just now.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: It’s great to see you.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Speaker 7
transcription: Can you get him to call me a little more.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: I’m going to put a lot of pressure on him. He’ll call you today in a little while.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Thank you.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Thank you very much.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: All right, dad.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: Great to meet you.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Speaker 7
transcription: Thank you, sir.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: He handled that better than I thought he would. Thank you.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: He was really good. I was really worried about that. He was nice.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: He got tipped off, so this must’ve been leaked. I don’t know how.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: He was nice. Dave, thank you very much.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Dave Portnoy
transcription: Yeah, I appreciate it. Thank you very much. Oh, can’t do it.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports

speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: A great honor.
headlin: Donald Trump Interview Transcript With Dave Portnoy of Barstool Sports
